name: footstep
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 the sound made by a person walking as their foot touches the ground, or a step (= foot movement): Walking along the darkened street, he heard footsteps close behind him. footsteps [ plural ]
the route a person has taken in order to reach a place or to achieve something: retrace your footsteps When he realized he'd lost his wallet, he retraced his footsteps (= went back the way he had come).
